__TOC__

'''February 2009'''

==== Technical ====

* Edubuntu menu editor is now included in archives and Edubuntu seeds
* Jonathan Carter has updated artwork package to include new icon themes as well as the new wallpaper designed by Mads Rosendahl
* Qimo packages made it into archive just in time for feature freeze

==== Community ====

* Marc Gariepy is the newest Edubuntu member!
* Bug Day Scheduled for 23 February 2010
* Susan Steward and Dhillion Vikram are working on revamping the Edubuntu website- making good progress.
* Edubuntu Council charter has been updated to reflect the number of members, quorum and chairman for EC meetings: https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Edubuntu/Council
